verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> out of the <S%H5591>whirlwind,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> that <S%H2821>darkens<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> by <S%H4405>words<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge?<s%>
<S%H247>Gird<s%> up <S%H4994>now<s%> your <S%H2504>loins<s%> like a <S%H1397>man;<s%> for I will <S%H7592>demand<s%> of you, and <S%H3045>answer<s%> you me.
<S%H375>Where<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> you when I laid the <S%H3245>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth?<s%> <S%H5046>declare,<s%> if you have <S%H998>understanding.<s%>

<S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H7760>laid<s%> the <S%H4461>measures<s%> thereof, <S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H3045>know?<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H5186>stretched<s%> the <S%H6957>line<s%> on it?
<S%H5921>Whereupon<s%> <S%H4100><s%> are the <S%H134>foundations<s%> thereof <S%H2883>fastened?<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H3384>laid<s%> the <S%H6438>corner<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> thereof;
When the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H3556>stars<s%> <S%H7442>sang<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7321>shouted<s%> for joy?
Or who <S%H5526>shut<s%> up the <S%H3220>sea<s%> with <S%H1817>doors,<s%> when it <S%H1518>broke<s%> <S%H1518>forth,<s%> as if it had <S%H3318>issued<s%> out of the <S%H7358>womb?<s%>
When I <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> the <S%H3830>garment<s%> thereof, and thick <S%H6205>darkness<s%> a swaddling <S%H2854>cloth<s%> for it,
And <S%H7665>broke<s%> up for it my <S%H2706>decreed<s%> place, and <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> and <S%H1817>doors,<s%>

And <S%H559>said,<s%> Till <S%H5704>now<s%> <S%H6311><s%> shall you <S%H935>come,<s%> but <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>further:<s%> and <S%H6311>here<s%> shall your <S%H1347>proud<s%> <S%H1530>waves<s%> be <S%H7896>stayed?<s%>
Have you <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H4480>since<s%> your <S%H3117>days;<s%> and caused the <S%H7837>dayspring<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> his <S%H4725>place;<s%>
That it might <S%H270>take<s%> <S%H270>hold<s%> of the <S%H3671>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> that the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> might be <S%H5287>shaken<s%> out of it?
It is <S%H2015>turned<s%> as <S%H2563>clay<s%> to the <S%H2368>seal;<s%> and they <S%H3320>stand<s%> as a <S%H3830>garment.<s%>
And from the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> their <S%H216>light<s%> is <S%H4513>withheld,<s%> and the <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken.<s%>
Have you <S%H935>entered<s%> <S%H5704>into<s%> the <S%H5033>springs<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea?<s%> or have you <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H2714>search<s%> of the <S%H8415>depth?<s%>
Have the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> been <S%H1540>opened<s%> to you? or have you <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H8179>doors<s%> of the <S%H6757>shadow<s%> of <S%H6757>death?<s%>
Have you <S%H995>perceived<s%> the <S%H7338>breadth<s%> of the <S%H776>earth?<s%> <S%H5046>declare<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> it <S%H3605>all.<s%>
<S%H335>Where<s%> is the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H335>where<s%> <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H7931>dwells?<s%> and as for <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> <S%H335>where<s%> is the <S%H4725>place<s%> thereof,
That you should <S%H3947>take<s%> it to the <S%H1366>bound<s%> thereof, and that you should <S%H995>know<s%> the <S%H5410>paths<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> thereof?
<S%H3045>Know<s%> you it, <S%H3588>because<s%> you were <S%H227>then<s%> <S%H3205>born?<s%> or because the <S%H4557>number<s%> of your <S%H3117>days<s%> is <S%H7227>great?<s%>
Have you <S%H935>entered<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H7950>snow?<s%> or have you <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1259>hail,<s%>
<S%H834>Which<s%> I have <S%H2820>reserved<s%> against the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6862>trouble,<s%> against the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7128>battle<s%> and <S%H4421>war?<s%>
By <S%H335>what<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> is the <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H2505>parted,<s%> which <S%H6327>scatters<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%> wind on the <S%H776>earth?<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H6385>divided<s%> a <S%H8585>watercourse<s%> for the <S%H7858>overflowing<s%> of waters, or a <S%H1870>way<s%> for the <S%H2385>lightning<s%> of <S%H6963>thunder;<s%>
To cause it to <S%H4305>rain<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> where <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is; on the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> wherein there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H120>man;<s%>
To <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> the <S%H7722>desolate<s%> and <S%H4875>waste<s%> ground; and to cause the <S%H4161>bud<s%> of the tender <S%H1877>herb<s%> to <S%H6779>spring<s%> <S%H6779>forth?<s%>
<S%H3426>Has<s%> the <S%H4306>rain<s%> a <S%H1>father?<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H3205>begotten<s%> the <S%H96>drops<s%> of <S%H2919>dew?<s%>
Out of <S%H4310>whose<s%> <S%H990>womb<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> the <S%H7140>ice?<s%> and the <S%H3713>hoary<s%> <S%H3713>frost<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H3205>gendered<s%> it?
The <S%H4325>waters<s%> are <S%H2244>hid<s%> as with a <S%H68>stone,<s%> and the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep<s%> is <S%H3920>frozen.<s%>
Can you <S%H7194>bind<s%> the <S%H4575>sweet<s%> <S%H4575>influences<s%> of <S%H3598>Pleiades,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H6605>loose<s%> the <S%H4189>bands<s%> of <S%H3685>Orion?<s%>
Can you <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4216>Mazzaroth<s%> in his <S%H6256>season?<s%> or can you <S%H5148>guide<s%> <S%H5906>Arcturus<s%> with his <S%H1121>sons?<s%>
<S%H3045>Know<s%> you the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven?<s%> can you <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H4896>dominion<s%> thereof in the <S%H776>earth?<s%>
Can you <S%H7311>lift<s%> up your <S%H6963>voice<s%> to the <S%H5645>clouds,<s%> that <S%H8229>abundance<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> may <S%H3680>cover<s%> you?
Can you <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H1300>lightning,<s%> that they may go <S%H3212><s%>and <S%H559>say<s%> to you, <S%H2009>Here<s%> we are?
<S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H7896>put<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> in the <S%H2910>inward<s%> parts? <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H998>understanding<s%> to the <S%H7907>heart?<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> can <S%H5608>number<s%> the <S%H7834>clouds<s%> in <S%H2451>wisdom?<s%> or <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H7901>stay<s%> the <S%H5035>bottles<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%>
When the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H3332>grows<s%> into <S%H4165>hardness,<s%> and the <S%H7263>clods<s%> <S%H1692>stuck<s%> fast together?
Will you <S%H6679>hunt<s%> the <S%H2964>prey<s%> for the <S%H3833>lion?<s%> or <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H2416>appetite<s%> of the <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lions,<s%>
<S%H3588>When<s%> they <S%H7817>couch<s%> in their <S%H4585>dens,<s%> and <S%H3427>abide<s%> in the <S%H5521>covert<s%> to lie in <S%H695>wait?<s%>

<S%H4310>Who<s%> <S%H3559>provides<s%> for the <S%H6158>raven<s%> his <S%H6718>food?<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> his <S%H3206>young<s%> ones <S%H7768>cry<s%> to <S%H410>God,<s%> they <S%H8582>wander<s%> for <S%H1097>lack<s%> of <S%H400>meat.<s%>
